channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- Lion-AL00C
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- Lion-AL00C

item.title: CVE-2020-1880|2024-08-04T06:53:59.672Z -- huawei -- lion-al00c
item.description: Huawei smartphone Lion-AL00C with versions earlier than 10.0.0.205(C00E202R7P2) have a denial of service vulnerability. An attacker crafted specially file to the affected device. Due to insufficient input validation of the value when executing the file, successful exploit may cause device abnormal.
